languages.text: "То, что мне сюда сначала не пускали, а потом вызвали, как слугу, я нахожу возмутительным!"
"First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"
languages.original_text: "То, что мне сюда сначала не пускали, а потом вызвали, как слугу, я нахожу возмутительным!"

traits.locale_text: "First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"
"First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"
"First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"
"First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"

languages.text: “先是你们的人不让我进来，现在你又像使唤仆人一样把我叫过来。你们对待行商浪人的态度真是让人震惊！”
languages.original_text: "First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: “先是你们的人不让我进来，现在你又像使唤仆人一样把我叫过来。你们对待行商浪人的态度真是让人震惊！”

languages.text: «Primero se me prohíbe la entrada y luego se me convoca como si fuera un{mf||a} sirvient{mf|e|a}. ¡Menuda forma de tratar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente!».
languages.original_text: "First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: «Primero se me prohíbe la entrada y luego se me convoca como si fuera un{mf||a} sirvient{mf|e|a}. ¡Menuda forma de tratar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente!».

languages.text: 「最初はここに入ることを禁じられていたのが、今になって呼ばれるとは召使いのようだ。自由開拓者に対する扱いがなっていない！」
languages.original_text: "First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: 「最初はここに入ることを禁じられていたのが、今になって呼ばれるとは召使いのようだ。自由開拓者に対する扱いがなっていない！」

languages.text: « D'abord, on m'empêche d'entrer et maintenant, on me convoque comme {mf|un|une} domestique. Quelle façon consternante de traiter {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: "First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: « D'abord, on m'empêche d'entrer et maintenant, on me convoque comme {mf|un|une} domestique. Quelle façon consternante de traiter {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ! »

languages.text: "Erst werde ich am Eintreten gehindert, und jetzt werde ich wie {mf|ein Diener|eine Dienerin} herbestellt. So behandelt man {mf|keinen Freihändler|keine Freihändlerin}!"
languages.original_text: "First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: "Erst werde ich am Eintreten gehindert, und jetzt werde ich wie {mf|ein Diener|eine Dienerin} herbestellt. So behandelt man {mf|keinen Freihändler|keine Freihändlerin}!"

languages.text: "Önce girmeme müsaade etmiyorsun, şimdi de hizmetçin gibi ayağına çağırtıyorsun. Koca Hür Tacir'e böyle mi davranılırmış!"
languages.original_text: "First, I am barred from entering, and now I am summoned here like a servant. An appalling way to treat a Rogue Trader!"
